text: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا۟ يَكْسِبُونَ

translation.en.sahih: No! Rather, the stain has covered their hearts of that which they were earning.
translation.id.indonesian: Sekali-kali tidak (demikian), sebenarnya apa yang selalu mereka usahakan itu menutupi hati mereka.
